cz.opendata.tenderstats

Class ComponentConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.opendata.tenderstats.ComponentConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ComponentConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Holds component configuration needed for network communication with databases and other values.
    Author:
    Matej Snoha
    See Also:
